QuestData.Title: Bring the Hammer Down
QuestData.Description: There's nothing worse than a self-hating Twilight's Hammer cultist. Nothing! These idiots actually want to bring about the end of the world.$B$BThat marks them for extinction in my book.$B$BBetween the citadel veterans, the corrupted elementalists, and the twilight vindicators, you should have no shortage of targets.$B$BI could care less how you choose to kill them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Citadel Veterans, Corrupted Elementalists, and/or Twilight Vindicators.
QuestData.RewardText: Feels good to get a little blood on your hands, doesn't it? Especially when that blood belongs to such self-deluded fools.
